synopsis: In episode #13, Devam shares his transformative journey after quitting his job, exploring the importance of taking a break to reconnect with oneself and embrace creativity. He discusses his experiences traveling, DJing, and finding balance in a fast-paced world, emphasizing the value of living authentically and enjoying the process of life.
quotes: You need to be at peace with the way you're living your life.
Sometimes it's enough to just breathe. That's okay.
We're not on this planet to slave away; we're here to experience life.
If you have privilege, you should use it.
It's important to recognize that you have many valid ways to live your life.
I realized I was stuck in a rut, and I needed some space to untangle myself.
The goal of this break is to learn how to breathe and build a healthy relationship with my hobbies.
It's not about the results; it's about the process.
You can make a good show, but maybe the world isn't ready for it.
Your time and energy are valuable; don't waste them on people you don't like.
